analyzed: dukr'inya byed / kha nu nges pa / gamli 'gro / aad za ba / aata'o // pa ro& ksha la yang na'o zhes pas aada'i ghasli'o // gnyis brjod do // 'dis tsa sde'o // gnyis pa bzhi pa zhes pas tsha'i tsa dang dzha'i dza'o // aa'i au pa dh'a zhes pas 'phel ba ste ring po'o // ka ba ti'i tse kr'i yi ta la ma yin no // ka ba ti'i ste kung sgra la'o zhes pas 'di'i aabhy'a sa gang yin pa de'i tsa sder mi 'gyur te / tse kr'i yi ta'i pha rol lo // ko ku ya te / shin du ba'i don la kung la ya sgra'o // tse kr'i yi ta la yon tan no zhes pas yon tan no // n'a mi'i mtha' rnams kyi yan a'a yi zhes pas ring po'o //
translated: ṅa is the root of action.🔽ṇa is certainty.🔽ṇa is going.🔽ṇa is eating.🔽ṇa is that.🔽ṇa is also in parakṣaṇa.🔽The two are expressed.🔽By this, the ca class.🔽The second is the fourth.🔽By āyur, the increase, that is, the long one.🔽The ka class is not in the caryā.🔽By kabatī ca, the sound.🔽The abhaya of this is not in the ca class.🔽The caryā is beyond the āyur.🔽Ko ku yate.🔽The sound kuṅ is for the meaning of very.🔽By caryā, the quality.🔽The long one of the final nā is āy.🔽🔽

original: rnam 'gyur nges par bstan pa las /

analyzed: a'a sha / a'a sha tu:/

analyzed: bha ba ti'i aa'o //

analyzed: bha ba ti'i aa bhy'a sa'i pa ronyaksha la aa yig tu bsgyur bar 'gyur ro // ba bhu ba /

analyzed: ba bhu ba tu:/

analyzed: ba bhu bu:/ bhu yod pa la'o //

analyzed: gnyis brjod do //

analyzed: 'dis au yig gi aa yig go //

analyzed: bhu'i mtha' pa ro& ksha zhes pas ba yig a'a ga ma'o //

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /

analyzed: aa nu ba bhu be de ba datta na /

analyzed: las la a'atma ne'i tshig ae'o //

analyzed: bhu ba zhes ma byas pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa las so //

analyzed: ni dzi bi dzi bi sha rnams kyi byings thams cad pa la yon tan no //

analyzed: ni dzir gtsang ba /

original: bi dzir\ dngos po tha dad pa /
analyzed: bi dzir\ dngos po tha dad pa /

original: bi shli khyab pa la'o //
analyzed: bi shli khyab pa la'o //

analyzed: 'di rnams kyi aa bhy'a sa'i byings thams cad pa pha rol la yon tan du 'gyur ro // ne ne kti /

original: ne ni dzyat\/ ne nektu /
analyzed: ne ni dzyat\/ ne nektu /

analyzed: be bi dzy'at /

analyzed: be bektu / aa be bek\ / be bishta ta\/

analyzed: ba beshdu / aa be beta /

original: ti dang y'at\ dang tu dang di'o ;
analyzed: ti dang y'at\ dang tu dang di'o ;

analyzed: / aana\'o // dzu ho ti sogs las 'jig go //

original: 'dis yon tan no //
analyzed: 'dis yon tan no //

analyzed: au pa dh'a n'a mi'i 'ang zhes pas byings kyi yon tan no //

analyzed: y'a ta'i rkyen la ni spata m'i la 'ang ngo zhes pas yon tan med do //

analyzed: tsa sde'i ki'o // gsal byed @186a * // las di si dag gi zhes pas di dbyi'o //

analyzed: sha dang ta sde las zhes pas ta'i ta'o //

analyzed: rdzogs pa la yang ngo zhes pas ka'i ta'o //

original: byings thams cad pa zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: byings thams cad pa zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is meant by “all verbal roots”?

original: ni ne dza /
analyzed: ni ne dza /
translated: The verbal roots ni, ne, ja,🔽ata, bhrānta,

original: aata'o // bhrinya h'ad\ m'ing\ rnams kyi ait\'o //
analyzed: aata'o // bhrinya h'ad\ m'ing\ rnams kyi ait\'o //

original: dubhrinya 'dzin pa dang rgyas pa dag la'o //🔽ao h'ang 'gro ba /
analyzed: dubhrinya 'dzin pa dang rgyas pa dag la'o // ao h'ang 'gro ba /
translated: The verbal roots dṛś, “to see,” and bṛh, “to expand,” have the suffix iṭ in the sense of “to hold” and “to expand.”

original: m'ang\ 'jal ba /
analyzed: m'ang\ 'jal ba /
translated: The verbal root gam, “to go,” has the suffix o.🔽The verbal root mā, “to measure,” has the suffix iṭ.

original: 'di rnams kyi byings thams cad pa pha rol la aa bhy'a sa'i ai nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi byings thams cad pa pha rol la aa bhy'a sa'i ai nyid du 'gyur ro //

original: bi brti / bi bhri yata /🔽bi bhartu / aa bi bha:/🔽ti dang y'ata dang tu dang di'o //
analyzed: bi brti / bi bhri yata / bi bhartu / aa bi bha:/ ti dang y'ata dang tu dang di'o //

original: aanpi / snga ma bzhin du gnyis brjod pa la 'jig go //
analyzed: aanpi / snga ma bzhin du gnyis brjod pa la 'jig go //
translated: The verbal roots ti, yāta, tu, and di have the suffix iṭ in the sense of “the other side.”🔽The verbal roots an, “to go,” and pun, “to repeat,” have the suffix iṭ in the sense of “the other side.”

original: aa bhy'a sa'i bya ba la 'dis ai nyid do //
analyzed: aa bhy'a sa'i bya ba la 'dis ai nyid do //

original: yon tan no //
analyzed: yon tan no //
translated: [It is] a quality.

original: snga ma bzhin di dbyi'o //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin di dbyi'o //

original: dzi h'i te /
analyzed: dzi h'i te /

original: aa dzi h'i ta /🔽dzi h'i t'am\/ ao h'ang\ la barta m'a n'a'i te dang / sapta m'i'i a'it dang / panytsa m'i'i t'am\ dang / hyasta n'i'i ta'o //
analyzed: aa dzi h'i ta / dzi h'i t'am\/ ao h'ang\ la barta m'a n'a'i te dang / sapta m'i'i a'it dang / panytsa m'i'i t'am\ dang / hyasta n'i'i ta'o //
translated: Ajhi hi te.🔽Jihi tāṃ, ohaṃ, vartāmāne te, saptamī, pañcamī, hyastanīti.

original: snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin no //

analyzed: sapta m'i la aa bhyasta rnams kyi a'a yig go zhes pas a'a dbyi'o //

analyzed: gzhan la gnyis ka rnams kyi d'a min pa'i zhes pas a'i nyid do //

analyzed: mi m'i te / mi m'i t'a /

analyzed: mi m'i tam\/ aa mi m'i ta /

original: m'ang\ 'jal ba /
analyzed: m'ang\ 'jal ba /

original: gzhan snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhan snga ma bzhin no //

original: byings thams cad pa zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: byings thams cad pa zhes pa ci zhe na /

original: ba bh'a ra /
analyzed: ba bh'a ra /

original: dza he / ma me /
analyzed: dza he / ma me /

original: aa ta / ae'o //
analyzed: aa ta / ae'o //

original: mtshams sbyor zhes pas dbyi'o //
analyzed: mtshams sbyor zhes pas dbyi'o //

original: aarti pi brti dag gi 'ang ngo //
analyzed: aarti pi brti dag gi 'ang ngo //

analyzed: aarti zhes pas ri 'gro ba la'o zhes pas 'di gzung ngo //

original: de nyid kyi ni byings thams cad pa pha rol la aa bhy'a sa srid kyi ri 'gro ba dang thob pa dag la'o zhes pas 'di ni min no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi ni byings thams cad pa pha rol la aa bhy'a sa srid kyi ri 'gro ba dang thob pa dag la'o zhes pas 'di ni min no //
translated: The root of that, sarvatra, is in the other, and abhyāsa is in going and obtaining, so this is not it.

original: ri sri 'gro ba /
analyzed: ri sri 'gro ba /

original: pr'i skyong ba dang gang ba dag la'o zhes pa 'di dag gi aa bhy'a sa'i byings thams cad pa pha rol la ai nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pr'i skyong ba dang gang ba dag la'o zhes pa 'di dag gi aa bhy'a sa'i byings thams cad pa pha rol la ai nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Parī is in guarding and filling, so the root abhyāsa of these becomes ī itself in the other.

original: ai yarti / ai spri y'ata /🔽ai yartu / aee ya:/
analyzed: ai yarti / ai spri y'ata / ai yartu / aee ya:/

original: ti / y'ata /
analyzed: ti / y'ata /

original: tu / di'i /
analyzed: tu / di'i /

original: aanbi / dzu ho ti sogs las 'jig go //
analyzed: aanbi / dzu ho ti sogs las 'jig go //

original: dzu ho ti sogs rnams kyi gnyis brjod do //
analyzed: dzu ho ti sogs rnams kyi gnyis brjod do //

original: ri yig gi aa yig go //
analyzed: ri yig gi aa yig go //
translated: The letter a of the letter ri.

original: 'dis ai nyid do //
analyzed: 'dis ai nyid do //

original: a'a bhy'a sa'i 'dra ba'i yi ge ma yin pa la zhes ai ya'o //
analyzed: a'a bhy'a sa'i 'dra ba'i yi ge ma yin pa la zhes ai ya'o //

original: yon tan no //🔽gsal byed las di si dag gi zhes pas di dbyi'o //
analyzed: yon tan no // gsal byed las di si dag gi zhes pas di dbyi'o //
translated: It is a quality.🔽 The letter di of the sibilants is di.

original: dbyangs dang po rnams kyi dang po'i 'phel ba'o zhes pas 'phel ba'o //🔽pi barti / pi pur++y'at /
analyzed: dbyangs dang po rnams kyi dang po'i 'phel ba'o zhes pas 'phel ba'o // pi barti / pi pur++y'at /
translated: The first of the first of the vowels is the augment, according to of the sibilants, di and si.🔽 piyarti, pipūryāt,

original: pi bartu / aa pis:/
analyzed: pi bartu / aa pis:/
translated: piyartu, apisya,🔽

original: pr'i skyong ba dang gang ba dag la'o //
analyzed: pr'i skyong ba dang gang ba dag la'o //
translated: In the case of the augment par and the augment par, the augment par is added.

analyzed: @186b gzhan snga ma bzhin no // mchur gyur au pa dh'a'i 'ang aur 'o zhes pas aura'o //
translated: The other is as before.🔽In the case of the augment ur, the augment ur is added to the augment upa.

original: n'a mi'i ra ba dag gsal byed la zhes pas ring po'o //
analyzed: n'a mi'i ra ba dag gsal byed la zhes pas ring po'o //
translated: In the case of the augment r, the augment r is added to the augment na.

original: byings thams cad pa la zhes pa ci zhe na /🔽a'ara / pa p'ara /🔽aata'o // gnyis brjod do //
analyzed: byings thams cad pa la zhes pa ci zhe na / a'ara / pa p'ara / aata'o // gnyis brjod do //
translated: What is the augment of all roots?🔽The augment par is added to the root ar,

original: ri'i yi ge aa yig go //🔽dang po'i aa'i zhes pas ring po'o ;
analyzed: ri'i yi ge aa yig go // dang po'i aa'i zhes pas ring po'o ;
translated: and the augment par is added to the root ap.🔽The augment at is added to the root at.🔽The augment ar is added to the root ri.

original: / aa'i au pa dh'a zhes pas 'phel ba'o //
analyzed: / aa'i au pa dh'a zhes pas 'phel ba'o //
translated: The augment ai is added to the root upa.

original: san la aa'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: san la aa'i yi ge'o //
translated: The augment san is added to the root i.

original: san gyi mtshan pa'i aa bhy'a sa'i aa'i yi ge gang yin pa de ai nyid du 'gyur ro //🔽pi paksha ti /🔽pi paksha ti /🔽du pa tsa sha 'tshed /
analyzed: san gyi mtshan pa'i aa bhy'a sa'i aa'i yi ge gang yin pa de ai nyid du 'gyur ro // pi paksha ti / pi paksha ti / du pa tsa sha 'tshed /
translated: The ai of the augment san is changed to i.🔽The augment pipkṣati is added to the root pip.

original: batsa brjod pa /🔽'tshed par 'dod do //🔽brjod par 'dod do zhes pas san\'o //
analyzed: batsa brjod pa / 'tshed par 'dod do // brjod par 'dod do zhes pas san\'o //
translated: The augment pipkṣati is added to the root pip.🔽The augment dupa is added to the root ca.

original: gnyis brjod do //🔽'dis ai nyid do //
analyzed: gnyis brjod do // 'dis ai nyid do //
translated: The augment bhu is added to the root bhu.

original: tsa sde'i ki'o //
analyzed: tsa sde'i ki'o //
translated: The augment bhu is added to the root bhu.🔽The augment san is added to the root u.🔽The augment san is added to the root u.🔽The augment ki is added to the root ca.

original: pi p'a sa ti /
analyzed: pi p'a sa ti /
translated: The augment pipāsati is added to the root pip.

original: yi y'a sa ti /🔽pa 'thung ba /
analyzed: yi y'a sa ti / pa 'thung ba /
translated: The augment yiyāsati is added to the root yiy.

original: y'a thob pa /
analyzed: y'a thob pa /
translated: The augment pā is added to the root pā.🔽The augment yā is added to the root yā.

original: 'thung bar 'dod do //
analyzed: 'thung bar 'dod do //
translated: I desire to drink.

original: thob par 'dod do zhes pas sana\'o //
analyzed: thob par 'dod do zhes pas sana\'o //
translated: I desire to obtain.

original: aa'i yi ge zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: aa'i yi ge zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is the letter A?

original: bu bhu sha ti /
analyzed: bu bhu sha ti /

original: san gyi mtshan pa'i zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: san gyi mtshan pa'i zhes pa ci zhe na /

original: b'a ba tsi sha te ;
analyzed: b'a ba tsi sha te ;
translated: It is the son of Avaciṣṭa.

analyzed: shin tu 'tshed par 'dod do zhes pas y'a sgra'o //

original: gnyis brjod do //
analyzed: gnyis brjod do //

original: a'a ga ma med pa'i ring po zhes pas ring po'o //
analyzed: a'a ga ma med pa'i ring po zhes pas ring po'o //

original: de nas sana\'o //🔽aita'o // aa dbyi ba 'ang ngo /
analyzed: de nas sana\'o // aita'o // aa dbyi ba 'ang ngo /
translated: Then the letter Sa.🔽It is the son of Iḍā.

original: ya'i aan med pa la'o zhes pas ya dbyi'o //🔽dza dang mthar gnas dang pa sde pha rol can a'a yig la au'i yi ge go //🔽dza dang mthar gnas dang pa sde dang de rnams ni dza dang mthar gnas dang pa sde'o //
analyzed: ya'i aan med pa la'o zhes pas ya dbyi'o // dza dang mthar gnas dang pa sde pha rol can a'a yig la au'i yi ge go // dza dang mthar gnas dang pa sde dang de rnams ni dza dang mthar gnas dang pa sde'o //
translated: The letter Ya is without the letter A.🔽The letter U is the letter A with the letter Ja, the final letter, and the letter Pa.🔽The letter Ja, the final letter, and the letter Pa are those.

original: de rnams pha rol te au yig gang las dza dang mthar gnas dang pa sde pha rol dang bcas pa'i san la zhes pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de rnams pha rol te au yig gang las dza dang mthar gnas dang pa sde pha rol dang bcas pa'i san la zhes pa kho na'o //
translated: They are the other side, the letter U, from which the letter Ja, the final letter, and the letter Pa are the other side.🔽The letter Sa is just that.

original: aa bhy'a sa'i au yig gang dza dang mthar gnas dang pa sde pha rol te /🔽dza pha rol dang mthar gnas pha rol dang pa sde pha rol dang de'i san pha rol la ai nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: aa bhy'a sa'i au yig gang dza dang mthar gnas dang pa sde pha rol te / dza pha rol dang mthar gnas pha rol dang pa sde pha rol dang de'i san pha rol la ai nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: The letter a becomes i when followed by j, h, and p.🔽The letter j becomes i when followed by h, p, and s.

original: a'a yig la ste dza dang mthar gnas dang pa sde rnams kyang aa'i yi ge pha rol du gyur pa na'o //🔽dzi dzi ba yi sha ti /
analyzed: a'a yig la ste dza dang mthar gnas dang pa sde rnams kyang aa'i yi ge pha rol du gyur pa na'o // dzi dzi ba yi sha ti /
translated: The letter p becomes i when followed by h, and the letter s becomes i when followed by p.🔽ji jivāṣṭi

analyzed: narna rti / nri ti lus rnam par g-yo ba la'o //

original: ya sgra'o // sgrub pa thams cad rnams las dbyi ba'i sgrub pa stobs dang ldan no zhes pas yongs su bshad pas snga ma la tse kr'i yi ta yang na 'jig go //
analyzed: ya sgra'o // sgrub pa thams cad rnams las dbyi ba'i sgrub pa stobs dang ldan no zhes pas yongs su bshad pas snga ma la tse kr'i yi ta yang na 'jig go //
translated: The sound ya. Since it is explained that among all the accomplishments, the accomplishment of the powerful one is supreme, previously cakri yita is destroyed.

original: de nas gang rkyen phyis pa la rkyen gyi mtshan nyid do zhes pa'i tshig las gnyis brjod do //
analyzed: de nas gang rkyen phyis pa la rkyen gyi mtshan nyid do zhes pa'i tshig las gnyis brjod do //
translated: Then, from the words “that which is later than the condition is the characteristic of the condition,” two are expressed.

original: 'jig go yis phyis pa na rkyen gyi bya ba'o zhes pas 'di'i 'ang dbyi ba gnas so //
analyzed: 'jig go yis phyis pa na rkyen gyi bya ba'o zhes pas 'di'i 'ang dbyi ba gnas so //
translated: “ When it is later than the destruction, it is the action of the condition” — this also is elided.

original: dgag pa bstan pa mi rtag pa'o zhes pa'i tshig las gnyis brjod pa byas pa na /
analyzed: dgag pa bstan pa mi rtag pa'o zhes pa'i tshig las gnyis brjod pa byas pa na /
translated: “ Impermanence is taught by the negative” — having made this statement, two are expressed.

original: r'i rir zhes pa 'dis de rnams a'a ga ma'o //
analyzed: r'i rir zhes pa 'dis de rnams a'a ga ma'o //
translated: “ By this ‘ra’ and ‘ri,’ those are ‘ā’ and ‘ga’ respectively.

original: ra las aa yig brjod pa'i don to //
analyzed: ra las aa yig brjod pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the syllable ‘a’ is expressed from ‘ra.’

original: byed pa po la pa ra smee'i tshig ces pas brta m'a na'i ti'o //
analyzed: byed pa po la pa ra smee'i tshig ces pas brta m'a na'i ti'o //
translated: “ The word ‘para’ is for the agent” — thus ‘ta’ and ‘mā’ are for ‘na.’

original: aanbi / aad sogs las 'jig go //
analyzed: aanbi / aad sogs las 'jig go //
translated: “ ‘Anvi’ — from ‘a’ and so forth, ‘it is destroyed.’

original: au pa dha n'a mi'i zhes pas yon tan no //
analyzed: au pa dha n'a mi'i zhes pas yon tan no //

original: 'dir na nyid du mi 'gyur te kyang gi sgra las so //
analyzed: 'dir na nyid du mi 'gyur te kyang gi sgra las so //
translated: Here, it is not ‘na’ itself, but from the word ‘ca.’

original: ri ldan pa zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: ri ldan pa zhes pa ci zhe na /

analyzed: ts'a karti / kr'i rnam par g-yeng ba la'o //

analyzed: shin du g-yeng ngo zhes pas ya sgra'o //
translated: “ ‘It is very distracted’ — thus, the syllable ‘ya.’

original: snga ma bzhin du 'jig go //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du 'jig go //
translated: “ As before, ‘it is destroyed.’

original: gnyis brjod thung ngu'o //
analyzed: gnyis brjod thung ngu'o //

analyzed: a'a ga ma med pa'i ring po'o zhes pas ring po'o //

analyzed: gzhan snga ma bzhin no //

analyzed: mtshungs pa ma phyis pa na yang ba la ain tsan\ pha rol la sana bzhin no //

analyzed: san la gang brjod pa de ain tsan pha rol la 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //

original: gnyis brjod / deng zhes ma byas pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis brjod / deng zhes ma byas pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The non-use of today is because of the various forms.

original: jo bo drag 'byor gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa slob ma la phan par kun bshad pa'i skabs las rkang pa gsum pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: jo bo drag 'byor gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa slob ma la phan par kun bshad pa'i skabs las rkang pa gsum pa rdzogs so /
translated: This completes the third line of the commentary composed by the venerable Drahīyaśas, which is beneficial for students, from the chapter of the complete explanation.

original: // / mthar gnas pa pha rol gyi dbyangs dang bcas pa'i sam pra s'a ra na'o //
analyzed: // / mthar gnas pa pha rol gyi dbyangs dang bcas pa'i sam pra s'a ra na'o //
translated: The final-placed one is samprasāraṇa with the vowel of the other.

original: mthar gnas pa gang dbyangs pha rol dang lhan cig 'jug pa de ni /
analyzed: mthar gnas pa gang dbyangs pha rol dang lhan cig 'jug pa de ni /
translated: The final-placed one that engages together with the vowel of the other,

original: pha rol dang dbyangs dang bcas par yongs su bshad do //
analyzed: pha rol dang dbyangs dang bcas par yongs su bshad do //
translated: is explained as having the other and the vowel.

original: byings mthar gnas pa gang pha rol gyi dbyangs dang bcas par gnas pa sam pra s'a ra na ru 'gyur ro zhes yongs su bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: byings mthar gnas pa gang pha rol gyi dbyangs dang bcas par gnas pa sam pra s'a ra na ru 'gyur ro zhes yongs su bshad par bya'o //
translated: The final-placed vowel that remains together with the vowel of the other, becomes samprasāraṇa, it should be explained.

original: 'o na gal te dbyangs med pa'i gnas la gang mtshams sbyor byas par 'gyur ba de nyid kyi gzugs yang dag par skyed do ba de nyid kyi gzugs yang dag par skyed do zhes pas ci ltar sam pra s'a ra na la ma byas par 'gyur /🔽de'i phyir sam pra s'a ra na sgrub pa'i shugs nyid las dbyangs dang bcas pa grub pas sam pra s'a ra na'o zhes pas tshig gi pha rol dbyangs dang bcas pa smos pa don med do zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na gal te dbyangs med pa'i gnas la gang mtshams sbyor byas par 'gyur ba de nyid kyi gzugs yang dag par skyed do ba de nyid kyi gzugs yang dag par skyed do zhes pas ci ltar sam pra s'a ra na la ma byas par 'gyur / de'i phyir sam pra s'a ra na sgrub pa'i shugs nyid las dbyangs dang bcas pa grub pas sam pra s'a ra na'o zhes pas tshig gi pha rol dbyangs dang bcas pa smos pa don med do zhe na /
translated: Well, if the vowel is not present, then the very one that is conjoined would generate the form of that very one. How would it not be a saṃprasa raṇā?🔽Therefore, since the mere power of the saṃprasa raṇā establishes the vowel, the statement of the vowel of the other word is meaningless in saṃprasa raṇā.

original: 'di ni snying po med pa ste sam pra s'a ra na'i shugs las mtshams sbyor gyi bya ba las byas par mi 'gyur ba pha rol gyi dbyangs dang bcas pa nyid grub bo zhes pas pha rol smos pa rnam pa gsal ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: 'di ni snying po med pa ste sam pra s'a ra na'i shugs las mtshams sbyor gyi bya ba las byas par mi 'gyur ba pha rol gyi dbyangs dang bcas pa nyid grub bo zhes pas pha rol smos pa rnam pa gsal ba'i don du'o //
translated: This is pointless, because the mere power of saṃprasa raṇā establishes that the other word is not conjoined, and the mere power of saṃprasa raṇā establishes that the other word has a vowel. Therefore, the statement of the other word is for the purpose of clarifying the form.

original: 'dis sam pra s'a ra na'o //🔽gnyis brjod do //
analyzed: 'dis sam pra s'a ra na'o // gnyis brjod do //
translated: [The root] dyu, to shine, has the augment sa.

original: mtshungs pa'i ring po'o //🔽bidhya te / aushya te /🔽bitsya te / pritstshya /
analyzed: mtshungs pa'i ring po'o // bidhya te / aushya te / bitsya te / pritstshya /
translated: [The root] dīrgha, long, has the augment sa.🔽[The root] vid, to know, has the augment ta.🔽[The root] uś, to desire, has the augment ta.🔽[The root] vic, to discriminate, has the augment ta.🔽[The root] briś, to desire, has the augment ta.

original: brishtsya te / bhridzdzya te /🔽byadha snun / bsha mdzes /
analyzed: brishtsya te / bhridzdzya te / byadha snun / bsha mdzes /

original: byatsa zol / pratstsha shes pa /
analyzed: byatsa zol / pratstsha shes pa /
translated: [The root] bjac, to know, has the augment zol.

original: ao brashtsu gcod /
analyzed: ao brashtsu gcod /

original: bhrasdza 'tshed / te'o //
analyzed: bhrasdza 'tshed / te'o //

original: yana'o // sam bra s'a ra na'o //
analyzed: yana'o // sam bra s'a ra na'o //

original: dhut rnams kyi gsum pa'o zhes pa'i tshig las li tu sa la so las byung zhes yi ge gnas mthun pa'i phyir bhrasdza'i sa gsum pa de'i da'o //
analyzed: dhut rnams kyi gsum pa'o zhes pa'i tshig las li tu sa la so las byung zhes yi ge gnas mthun pa'i phyir bhrasdza'i sa gsum pa de'i da'o //

original: ta sde'i tsat'i sde pa zhes pas da'i dza'o //
analyzed: ta sde'i tsat'i sde pa zhes pas da'i dza'o //

original: badya ti / bi tsa ti /

original: prishtsa ti / bhridzdzati /

analyzed: nyi sva pa nyal pa la'o //

analyzed: btsa smra ba zhes pa 'di dag dang / de bzhin du yadza sogs rnams kyang ste /

analyzed: yadza lha mchod pa dang 'grogs par byed pa dang sbyin pa rnams la'o //

analyzed: waha thob pa /

original: byenya sdom pa /
analyzed: byenya sdom pa /

analyzed: bad\ smra bas gnas pa la'o //

analyzed: du ao shi 'gro ba 'phel ba la'o zhes pa 'di rnams kyi mthar gnas pa sam pra s'a ra nar 'gyur te /

analyzed: yan pha rol la dang pa ro& ksha yon tan med @193b pa la dang a'a sh'isha yon tan med pa pha rol la'o //

analyzed: sogs pa'i sgra ni ya dza la 'brel gyi sogs pa'i tsi la ma yin te /

analyzed: sva pi smos pa don med par 'gyur bas so //

analyzed: nyal bar byed zin la nishth'a'o zhes pas kta bantu'o // smra bar byas zin /

analyzed: 'gran par byed zin / srad pur byas zin /

original: srad bur byed zin /
analyzed: srad bur byed zin /

analyzed: smra bar byas zin /

analyzed: smra bar byed zin la nishtha'o zhes pas kta dang kta bantu'o //

original: 'gro ba 'phel bar byas zin /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'phel bar byas zin /

Go!🔽🔽

original: ba 'phel bar byed zin la 'gro ba'i don dang las med pa zhes pas kta dang nishth'a'o zhes pas kta bantu'o //
analyzed: ba 'phel bar byed zin la 'gro ba'i don dang las med pa zhes pas kta dang nishth'a'o zhes pas kta bantu'o //
translated: The affix kta is added to the root gam, to go, and the affix niṣṭhā is added to that, and the affix ktavant is added to that, by the rule gamanīyādīnām.

original: sam pra s'a ra na'o //
analyzed: sam pra s'a ra na'o //

original: wa tsa'i tsa sde'i ki'o //
analyzed: wa tsa'i tsa sde'i ki'o //

original: yadza'i bhridza sogs rnams kyi sha'o //🔽ba ha'i ha'i dha'o zhes pas dha'o //
analyzed: yadza'i bhridza sogs rnams kyi sha'o // ba ha'i ha'i dha'o zhes pas dha'o //

original: gha dha dha bha rnams las zhes pas ta'i dha'o ;🔽/sha dang ta sde las sde'i ta sde'o zhes pas dha'i dha'o //
analyzed: gha dha dha bha rnams las zhes pas ta'i dha'o ; /sha dang ta sde las sde'i ta sde'o zhes pas dha'i dha'o //
translated: The affix taddha is added to that, by the rule ghādīnām.🔽 The affix taddha is added to that, by the rule śatādīnām.

original: dha'i dha la dbyi'o //
analyzed: dha'i dha la dbyi'o //
translated: The affix dhi is added to that, by the rule dhadhādyānām.

original: au pa dha'i ring po'ang ngo zhes pas ring po'o //
analyzed: au pa dha'i ring po'ang ngo zhes pas ring po'o //
translated: The long vowel is added to that, by the rule upadhādir dīrghaś ca.

original: by'a hva shvi rnams kyi sam pra s'a ra na byas pa na de mtha' ring po'o zhes pas ring po'o //
analyzed: by'a hva shvi rnams kyi sam pra s'a ra na byas pa na de mtha' ring po'o zhes pas ring po'o //
translated: The long vowel is added to that, by the rule vyāhaśvīrādīnām samprāśaraṇe tasya dīrghaḥ.

original: lu sogs dang ao rjes su 'brel pa las kyang ngo zhes pas na nyid do //
analyzed: lu sogs dang ao rjes su 'brel pa las kyang ngo zhes pas na nyid do //

original: aut ces pas 'dir ring por mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: aut ces pas 'dir ring por mi 'gyur te /
translated: The long vowel is not added here, by the rule uta.

original: ba'i kvip las so zhes pa'i nges pa las so //
analyzed: ba'i kvip las so zhes pa'i nges pa las so //
translated: The affix na is added to that, by the rule vaikapāt.

original: ba si'i nishth'i la'ang ngo zhes pas aita'o //
analyzed: ba si'i nishth'i la'ang ngo zhes pas aita'o //

original: sh'a si / b'a si zhes pas sha'o //
analyzed: sh'a si / b'a si zhes pas sha'o //

original: yon tan med pa la zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: yon tan med pa la zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is meant by “without qualities”?

original: susha pa / aata'o //
analyzed: susha pa / aata'o //
translated: In su-sha, a-ta.

original: gnyis brjod / pa ro& ksha la aa bhyasa'i zhes pas sam pra s'a ra na'o //
analyzed: gnyis brjod / pa ro& ksha la aa bhyasa'i zhes pas sam pra s'a ra na'o //
translated: In the dual, paro and ksha, with abhyasi.

original: svossashti / gnyis ka rnams kyi aa bhya sa'i pa ro& ksha la'o //
analyzed: svossashti / gnyis ka rnams kyi aa bhya sa'i pa ro& ksha la'o //
translated: In the dual, svapshti, paro and ksha with abhyasi.

original: gnyis ka rnams kyi ste gra ha sogs rnams dang svo pi sogs rnams kyi aa bhy'a sa'i mthar gnas pa pa ro& ksh'a pha rol la sam pra s'a ra na ra 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnyis ka rnams kyi ste gra ha sogs rnams dang svo pi sogs rnams kyi aa bhy'a sa'i mthar gnas pa pa ro& ksh'a pha rol la sam pra s'a ra na ra 'gyur ro //
translated: In the dual, of graha and so on, and of svopi and so on, abhyasi is at the end, paro and ksha become samprasaranam.

original: gra hi pratstshi /
analyzed: gra hi pratstshi /

analyzed: bhrasdza rnams kyi aa bhy'a sa yod pa'am med pa sam pra s'ar na la khyad par med do //
translated: In bhrshja, whether there is abhyasa or not, there is no difference in samprasaranam.

original: bra shtsi'i khyad par med ces kha cig smra'o //
analyzed: bra shtsi'i khyad par med ces kha cig smra'o //

original: de ni snying po med pa ste /
analyzed: de ni snying po med pa ste /

analyzed: ma byas na ni brashtsa'i ra yig gi sam pra s'a ra nal ba yig gi sam pra s'a ra na ru 'gyur byas na ni mi 'gyur te /
translated: If it is not done, then the samprāśa of the ra vowel of bṛśa becomes the samprāśa of the na vowel of nala. If it is done, it does not become so.

original: sam pra s'a ra na ma yin no zhes bkag pa las so //
analyzed: sam pra s'a ra na ma yin no zhes bkag pa las so //

analyzed: 'di ni yon tan dang bcas pa'i don to //

original: ba ba tu:/ ba bu:/

original: benya snal ma'i rgyud /
analyzed: benya snal ma'i rgyud /

original: aa tus\ dang aus\ dag go //
analyzed: aa tus\ dang aus\ dag go //

original: gnyis brjod / byings thams cad pa ma yin pa la a'a dbyi'o zhes pas a'a dbyi'o //
analyzed: gnyis brjod / byings thams cad pa ma yin pa la a'a dbyi'o zhes pas a'a dbyi'o //

original: shi shvi ya tu:/
analyzed: shi shvi ya tu:/

original: shi shvi yu:/ du ao shvi 'gro /
analyzed: shi shvi yu:/ du ao shvi 'gro /

analyzed: byings kyi ai'i yi ge dang zhes pas ai ya\'o //

original: aa bhy'a sa'i nges pa yang ngo //
analyzed: aa bhy'a sa'i nges pa yang ngo //

original: ba boo // shi shva ya /
analyzed: ba boo // shi shva ya /

original: aata'o // gnyis brjod /
analyzed: aata'o // gnyis brjod /

original: aa yig las aat aoo'o //
analyzed: aa yig las aat aoo'o //

analyzed: mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge la 'ang ngo zhes pas aa dbyi'o //

analyzed: aa'i au pa dh'a zhes pas 'phel ba'o //

analyzed: 'dir aa bhy'a sa'i pa ro& ksha la zhes pas sampra s'a ra na thob pa la'o //

original: sva pi sya /
analyzed: sva pi sya /

original: sya mu / sva na /
analyzed: sya mu / sva na /

The Sthā-vowel is for the Sthā-vowel.

original: dhvan sgra la'o //
analyzed: dhvan sgra la'o //

original: se si mya te /
analyzed: se si mya te /

analyzed: be b'i ya te /

analyzed: shin tu nyal bar byed /

analyzed: sdom par byed ces pas ya sgra'o //

original: sam pra s'a ra na'o //
analyzed: sam pra s'a ra na'o //

analyzed: gnyis brjod / tse kr'i yi ta la yon tan no //

original: bya ya ti /
analyzed: bya ya ti /

analyzed: tut sogs las byings thams cad pa la'o zhes pas aita'o //

original: aa s'u shu pat /
analyzed: aa s'u shu pat /

analyzed: tsana'o // k'a ri ta dbyi'o //

original: sam pra s'a ra n'ao //
analyzed: sam pra s'a ra n'ao //

original: gnyis brjod do //
analyzed: gnyis brjod do //

analyzed: yang ba'i ring po'o zhes pas ring po'o /

original: tsan la zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: tsan la zhes pa ci zhe na /

analyzed: sva pya ti / sva pi'i mthar gnas ain\'o //

analyzed: te'o // byings thams cad pa la ya na'o //

analyzed: k'a ri ta dbyi'o // sva pi'i tsan med pa ain med do zhes pas ain nges par bstan pas /

analyzed: sva pi'i 'ba' zhig tsan la brjod pa las mi 'gyur zhes pa'o //

analyzed: gra hi sva pi pratstsha rnams kyi san la'o //

analyzed: 'di rnams kyi mthar gnas pa sa pha rol la sam pra s'a ra nar 'gyur ro //

original: dzi ghri ksha ti /
analyzed: dzi ghri ksha ti /

original: su shupsa ti /🔽pi pritstsha sha ti /

analyzed: graha nye bar len pa la'o //

analyzed: nyi sva pa nyal ba la'o //

analyzed: pratstsha shes par 'dod do //

analyzed: nyal bar 'dod do //

analyzed: de bzhin du dri bar 'dod do la san\'o //

original: sam pra s'a ra na'o //
analyzed: sam pra s'a ra na'o //

analyzed: ha'i dha'o // byings kyi gsum pa dang po'i gha dha dha bha zhes pas ga'i gha'o //

analyzed: sha nyid do //

original: gnyis brjod do //
analyzed: gnyis brjod do //

analyzed: san la zhes pa ci zhe na /

original: shvasta ni t'a /
analyzed: shvasta ni t'a /

original: aita'o // ait ring po'o //
analyzed: aita'o // ait ring po'o //

analyzed: ts'a spri mchod pa dang / zhi ba dag @195b la'o zhes pa 'di'i tse kr'i yi ta pha rol la ki ru bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //

original: gnyis brjod do //
analyzed: gnyis brjod do //

original: ts'a ya te /

analyzed: ring po brjod pa ni bya ba sla ba'i don du'o //

original: pe p'i ya te /

original: gnyis brjod do //
analyzed: gnyis brjod do //
